personalinformation Module¶

The personalinformation module contains a class of the same name to manage the personal information of current user.

Note

The personalinformation class has several methods, but they are all marked as “experimental.” Read that as you will. The [source] link is there for a reason.

Warning

This method is experimental.

Classes¶

class synspot.personalinformation.PersonalInformation[source]¶
property default_mode¶

get the default mode set by user from DB. The default mode is set to active at first.

Returns

The default mode set by user.

Raises

OSError – Placeholder.

property exe_position¶

Get the path of the Algorithm entry point

Returns

None

Raises

OSError – Placeholder.

logout()[source]¶

Handle user logout by setting the __default_mode and __user_id to None

Returns

None

Raises

OSError – Placeholder.

property root¶

Get the root path of intermediate data storage

Returns

The root path of intermediate data storage.

Raises

OSError – Placeholder.

property user_id¶

get the user id of current user. The user id is set to None at first.

Returns

The user id of current user.

Raises

OSError – Placeholder.
